_sText:
This is beta3 for hellsparadise which is a surf map. Why isn't there B2?? because b2 was only small changes and fixes that would be a waste sending it here. List of changes
  • the buttons of the containers don't move anymore
  • I have changed the placement of the awp instead of the top
  • I have added a pistol container consisting:elites,p228's and deagles
  • i have added a grenade container at spawn
  • made it a bit bigger
list of bugs
  • the labels of the containers wont show up.
  • The water of the jail is abit wierd
Hope you enjoy this map i made. You may disteribute this map to other sites but with my permission. And if you are going to put it on a server, please do tell me as i want to play on the server.(please bear with my ping as i am in Singapore) Download link not working? Try this link The other download link :3
